description:
Three things to you

1. You will Learn how to, I promise To get Shortlisted

2. You will Learn how to do Great in Job Interview

3. All in one Course. The complete Package to get you your DREAM JOB

After spending 1000+ hours learning how to craft the perfect resume and then landing job interviews at top-tier companies -- I compiled all of my best resume strategies and tactics into a single, simple program.

This program is tested with hundreds of students who turned their ordinary resumes into world-class resumes.

Best of all, it only takes just an hour

How confident are you that you can land an interview for your dream job…that your resume will stand out enough to get you in the door?

My guess is…not very.

You see, most open positions get inundated by templated, unimpressive resumes that fail to impress and all look exactly alike. If you were first in your class at Harvard, maybe this doesn't bother you…

THE COURSE FEATURES :

Objective What the importance of A Perfect Resume?

Initial preparation needed- Setting the career direction and preparing a self SWOT.

Types of Resume-We discuss the various types of Resume-Chronological, functional and combo/hybrid.

Objective The objective statement is the direction you lay down and also is the value proposition that you can provide to the employer in terms of the skill sets and experience.

Accomplishment Here we provide the achievement that we have got as a measure of our skill performance at the market place.

Employment experience How to put up the employment experience in chronological sequence in terms of tenure or functional experience

Volunteer experience Any experience that showcases you in terms of leadership abilities, social cause or communication skills etc.

References The references that you put up may be a academic, professional or character letter.

Sample resumes We also look into the common errors committed, Do's and Do not's of resume building.

Power words used in resume and standard templates of Resume.
title: Art of Perfect Resume Writing – That gets YOU a JOB
